TopicTitle: KSP cuts off before main menu

Articles.Content:
Since yesterday evening I have been unable to play KSP. What keeps on occurring is that the program runs to the end of the first load at which point before I can get to start new game, load game and so forth the application immediately closes without warning or error message. Looking back in the steam folder here is the start of the error report.

Unity Player [version: Unity 4.5.2f1_9abb1b59b47c]

KSP.exe caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)

in module KSP.exe at 001b:00f960c8.

Error occurred at 2014-10-08_125850.

C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\KSP.exe, run by Paterson 1.

91% memory in use.

3072 MB physical memory [270 MB free].

0 MB paging file [2275 MB free].

2048 MB user address space [72 MB free].

Write to location 00000000 caused an access violation.

Context:

EDI: 0x00000000 ESI: 0x00000000 EAX: 0x00000000

EBX: 0x00000000 ECX: 0x00000000 EDX: 0x006f6e6f

EIP: 0x00f960c8 EBP: 0x0a33fb2c SegCs: 0x0000001b

EFlags: 0x00010206 ESP: 0x0a33faac SegSs: 0x00000023

Bytes at CS:EIP:

89 14 81 8b 55 c4 01 55 dc 40 ff 4d d4 89 45 d0

At this point I have

. Deleted and reinstalled settings

. Deleted local content and re-installed through steam

. Restarted computer

I have a 32 Bit, Windows 8.1 CPU with 4G Ram and a GTX 260 Video card. Until yesterday I was able to play the game with occasional crashes.

Thanks for reading and any help would be appreciated

Yeah, this seems to be going around. I think with the new parts, KSP is pushing memory limits. Edit your settings.cfg file and change the texture quality line to read TEXTURE_QUALITY = 1 (or even try 2 or 3). Then restart the game.

Cheers,

~Claw
